name: Mitch
text: How did you get in here?

name: Mitch
text: Thing is, you really need to leave.

name: Mitch
text: You think, you can defeat me?

name: Mitch
text: You'll need some of the most [rainbow freq=.25 sat=10  val=20]Buono![/rainbow] sauce around. If you expect to hold a candle to my sauce.

name: Mitch
text: [tornado radius=5 freq=2]LET'S SEE WHAT YOU GOT[/tornado].
